presentationTable.name: Time Series
presentationTable.description:
->
This folder contains several Period-To-Date and Period-Ago metrics based on Revenue fact.

presentationColumns.name: Period Ago Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return Day Ago, if month then month ago...
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Period Ago Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Variation to Last Period
presentationColumns.description: Shows the variation between current period and period Ago Revenu. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue Variation to Last Period

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Pct Var. to Last Period
presentationColumns.description: Shows the percentage variation between current period and period Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return variation to Day Ago, if month then variation to month ago...
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Revenue Pct Var\. to Last Period

presentationColumns.name: Trailing 3 Periods Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of current period plus 2 past Ago Revenue. This calculation is dependent on the time grain that is set in the query by the user. If day object is in the query, then this metric will return trailing 3 Days, if month then trailing 3 months...
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Trailing 3 Periods Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Month Ago Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Month Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of month ago.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Month Ago Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Quarter Ago Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Quarter Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Quarter ago.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Quarter Ago Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Year Ago Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Year Ago Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain and will always return the value as of Year ago.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Year Ago Revenue

presentationColumns.name: Quarter to Date Revenue
presentationColumns.description: Shows the Quarter to date sum of Revenue. This calculation is not dependent on the query time grain.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:SampleApp Lite.F0 Revenue Base Measures.Quarter to Date Revenue
